Pleasurable Activities

Logout
 

Introduction

This section is Pleasurable Activities. We will guide you through a series of screens which will help you understand more about your mood and the ups and downs of everyday life. You will see some videos of others who have experienced similar problems to you and how they have overcome them.

Later on we will help you to choose an activity to do in the coming week and we will monitor how this changes your mood.

Click play to watch the video below.

How many pleasurable things did you do last week?

None 1 2 to 4 More than 4
